abilities.name: Up, Up & Away
abilities.description: This character may move freely over all terrain and other models during Jog and Step actions, provided it does not end the move with the base overlapping another model or barrier terrain. It cannot take the Harvest action or the Melee Attack action, cannot be targeted by Melee Attack actions and does not engage enemy models or become engaged by enemy models. It does not block LoS, provide Cover, or suffer from Falling. When targeted by Arcane Actions, this character does not benefit from Cover.

abilities.name: Summon from the Depths
abilities.description: When this model is deployed or enters play, you may place a new friendly Aquatic Psychopomp in base contact. If deployed, this must be in the deployment zone as normal. This cannot bring a character into play if it is already in play.

abilities.name: Merfolk Magic
abilities.description: Place this model within target Water Feature. This ability may only be used if this model is within a Water Feature.

arcaneOutcomes.outcomeText: This model suffers 2 Wds.

Place a 50mm Diameter Water Feature within 3X" and LoS on open ground. This remains in place until end of game. A maximum of 3 Water Features may be placed by this troupe, if a fourth is placed you must choose and remove a Water Feature you created earlier this game.
Move target X+2" directly towards this model. Then, if the target is within 4" of a Water Feature it suffers 4 Magical Dmg
The resisting player may move this model 2".

abilities.name: Oceanic
abilities.description: This model's Jog actions are limited to 2" but may be made freely over Water Features.

signatureMove.name: Compressed Air
signatureMove.endSteps: This model suffers 1 Wd. All other models within 1" suffer 1 Wd then are moved 2" directly away.

abilities.name: Augments
abilities.description: Friendly charactres with Reload[...] gain the Machine keyword.

abilities.name: The Faculty
abilities.description: If Old Polly, Prod. Boffinsworth and Flinders Memphis were taken in this troupe at the start of the game, this character gains Rogue, Animal and Machine keywords.

abilities.name: Overclock
abilities.description: Target other friendly machine suffers 1 Wd, then may take any action available to them which would normally have an energy cost of (2). You may only target each character once per turn.

abilities.name: Gnomish Air Rifle
abilities.description: This ability cannot be used while this model is engaged.

arcaneOutcomes.outcomeText: This character suffers 4 Wds
Target suffers X+1 Impact Dmg

abilities.name: Have You Tired Turning it Off and On Again?
abilities.description: After a friendly Machine draws an Arcane Hand, they may suffer 1 Wd, shuffle the hand back into the Arcane deck and redraw the same number of cards (Resist Hand is unchanged).
